item.title: Trees along this road need pruning, 21st June
item.description:
Tree branches need cutting. The greenery growing out of the bottom also needs cutting as it is sprawling onto the pavement, making it difficult for more than one person at a time to walk on the pavement. This is the case up and down Oakfield Rd.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Limes Avenue, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Japanese knotweed in hospice garden, 21st June
item.description:
There is a huge stand of Japanese knotweed in the corner of the garden of this building. There was Hackney staff trimming hedges there today, when asked about the knotweed they seemed unaware. Concerned they might be spreading the problem
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Median Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Width restrictors Main Road, 21st June
item.description:
FOR THE ATTENTION OF RYAN Despite firm assurances that these would be replaced on Thursday or Friday this has yet again not happened.So as local residents we are continuing to have to endure hazardous road conditions and incessant noise from the base plates.This continues to be totally unacceptable and requires immediate resolution.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Main Road, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Green wheely bin bad smell, 21st June
item.description:
The green bin (written 16) smells terribly bad. It is creating bad smell around the neighbourhood. We can not even walk from the path. Also, big flies are everywhere now. It made like we are living in slum area. Council always collect that bin but never said anything to the bin owner ? Surprised
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pynham Close, Abbey Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet
